Posts.Title: help wanted please? kdee123 Lisa1962

Posts.Content: kdee123 wrote: Hello, i am new to this site and am asking for help/thoughts/opinions.  I am a 32 yr. old single parent who works full time and loves my sweet child.  I had been having some breast issues lately and felt some lumps in my left breast.  The doctor told me i could have a mammogram if i wanted to but he didn't feel there was a need to.  Well i am proactive so i went ahead and had the mammogram.  Much to my surprise, the dr. said that they found an undetected lump that can't be felt and it was 5mm.  Well they did a sonogram and told me that they were going to watch it closely and to come back in six months tohave another mammogram.  I am wondering if i should go ahead and get another mammogram in 3 months and/or go ahead and talk to a surgeon on my own about having a biopsy or anything.  I don't want to play around with this and i am scared.  Not to mention i will not be able to sleep for 6 months if i wait till may to find out.  Please if you have any thoughts or ideas, mention them.  Thank you so much.  May the Lord bless your day. Posts.Title: help wanted please? kdee123 Lisa1962
